term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - rate of change ratio
term.title: rate of change ratio

item.text: The quotient of two rates where the quantities are of the same kind in the same system for different components: (dQ(1)/dt)/(dQ(2)/dt); amount of substance rate ratio, (dn1/dt)/(dn2/dt).

item.alttext: Δ Q 1 / Δ t Δ Q 2 / Δ t = Δ Q 1
item.latex: \frac{\Delta Q_{1}/\Delta t}{\Delta Q_{2}/\Delta t}=\frac{\Delta Q_{1}}{\Delta Q_{2}}\ \Delta t

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 1569. 'Quantities and units for metabolic processes as a function of time (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 1572 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264101569)
